channel.title: Comments on: Goals for 2010
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: traingamer
item.dc:creator: traingamer
item.content:encoded:
Great post. I haven’t made a resolution in many years, but I always have goals!

I wholeheartedly recommend Toastmasters as an organization that can help you meet your speaking goals.

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: I respect you as much as anyone but how can someone like you improve? You're perfect already. :-)
